title: Financial assistance fund for hemophilia
context: [PART XXI.] HEMOPHILIA [ยง321-281] Financial assistance fund for hemophilia. There is established within the department of health a financial assistance fund for persons suffering from hemophilia who require hemophilia-related medical care and treatment, but who are unable to pay the entire costs of such medical care and treatment. [L 1983, c 280, pt of ยง2]
